remarks: Commutation law for identical variable specifiers.  Both sides of the biconditional are true when ` x ` and ` y ` are substituted with the same variable.  (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1993.)  Changed to a biconditional. (Revised by BJ, 26-Sep-2019.)
statement: aecom $p |- ( A. x x = y <-> A. y y = x ) $.
